an8.34:1.1: “Atthangasamannagate, bhikkhave, khette bijam vuttam na mahapphalam hoti na mahassadam na phatiseyyam.
an8.34:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, khettam unnamaninnami ca hoti, pasanasakkharikanca hoti, usaranca hoti, na ca gambhirasitam hoti, na ayasampannam hoti, na apayasampannam hoti, na matikasampannam hoti, na mariyadasampannam hoti.
an8.34:1.4: Evam atthangasamannagate, bhikkhave, khette bijam vuttam na mahapphalam hoti na mahassadam na phatiseyyam.
an8.34:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, atthangasamannagatesu samanabrahmanesu danam dinnam na mahapphalam hoti na mahanisamsam na mahajutikam na mahavippharam.
an8.34:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, samanabrahmana micchaditthika honti, micchasankappa, micchavaca, micchakammanta, micchaajiva, micchavayama, micchasatino, micchasamadhino.
an8.34:2.4: Evam atthangasamannagatesu, bhikkhave, samanabrahmanesu danam dinnam na mahapphalam hoti na mahanisamsam na mahajutikam na mahavippharam.
an8.34:3.1: Atthangasamannagate, bhikkhave, khette bijam vuttam mahapphalam hoti mahassadam phatiseyyam.
an8.34:3.3: Idha, bhikkhave, khettam anunnamaninnami ca hoti, apasanasakkharikanca hoti, anusaranca hoti, gambhirasitam hoti, ayasampannam hoti, apayasampannam hoti, matikasampannam hoti, mariyadasampannam hoti.
an8.34:3.4: Evam atthangasamannagate, bhikkhave, khette bijam vuttam mahapphalam hoti mahassadam phatiseyyam.
an8.34:4.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, atthangasamannagatesu samanabrahmanesu danam dinnam mahapphalam hoti mahanisamsam mahajutikam mahavippharam.
an8.34:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, samanabrahmana sammaditthika honti, sammasankappa, sammavaca, sammakammanta, sammaajiva, sammavayama, sammasatino, sammasamadhino.
an8.34:4.4: Evam atthangasamannagatesu, bhikkhave, samanabrahmanesu danam dinnam mahapphalam hoti mahanisamsam mahajutikam mahavippharanti.
